data.text: My printer fully relies on an app, which I'd never have gotten if I knew it was this bad. The app has been giving me grief for a while due to my printer disconnecting regularly and the app failing to process print jobs and giving no reason. Now my printer has ceased functioning entirely because the app simply says there's "a problem with the printer", No hint as to what. I just put in new ink cartridges and the report pages print fine. If it's not too late, don't waste your time with HP.

My issue is with the update done on the HP SMART APP. The update no longer allows you to do a printer scan using the mobile HP SMART APP. It gives an error message as follows: Feature Unavailable This feature is not supported by the selected printer, Connect to a different printer to use this feature. Contact HP Support. The app used to work perfectly from a mobile phone. Now it's awful. Why don't HP just fix the app the way it was to allow printer scanning from the mobile app. So frustrating!!!

Horrible!! I absolutely abhore this app and their printers. You need a subscription to use certain inks cartridges or it won't print. The printer is always glitching out so it doesn't print. To be able to use the printer you have to turn on all these intrusive settings. The printer is extremely slow. All I want is to have a printer that connects easily and prints easily. This company fails to provide that. Extremely frustrating product - now we need subscriptions to use printers. Horrendous.

if I didn't have to power it off and unplug every time I needed to use it, this would be a great printer and scanner. the HP smart app takes forever to load. half the time I need to clear cache and Uninstalled and reinstall and log in online for it or work properly. the intention is great. when it works it's great. the problem is getting it to work. not reliable.

Im not sure if its the apps fault or the printer itself, regardless, its a pain in the neck to use. Was extremely difficult to set up for some reason, had to be on the phone with support for a half hour or more. Even then, it still has issues connecting to the network, when all other devices in home connect seamlessly. Id go for a different company for printers.

Okay if a great majority of your reviews are complaining about similar difficulties you would think someone or being would address these via email, app messaging or something. My printer will not connect to my mobile phone, tablet or laptop. I constantly have had to turn it on and off with a 50/50 chance it would connect somehow. It shows it connected to my wifi, but is failing to connect to my phone. Your step by step troubleshooting is useless as if any very, little tech support.

What did you do??!!!! This app worked well enough, then now all of a sudden I can't adjust pictures before I print them anymore. For years I've been able to resize pictures. Now that option has disappeared from my app. It wants to just print the picture to fill/fit the entire sheet of paper. Sometimes I don't need a huge picture. Sometimes I want to print smaller things that don't take up the entire sheet of paper and use up all that ink. Why would you remove such a basic feature?

Absolute garbage since update!!! Nothing works right. Can't access all image folders like before to find what I need to print and can't scale the graphic as needed so it prints huge. When attempting to scale the graphic it prints a blurry mess and is unusable! Plus when scaling there is no more measurement showing size so its a total shot in the dark. I hate when companies fix what isn't broken and now it's a total disaster that is making me want to throw out the printer and try another brand!

Printer has scanning function, and have used it in the past. Won't work now. Says "Feature Unavailable." Tried troubleshooting it with no avail. Tried another route to try to troubleshoot it more, and said to download HP Support. Downloaded it, and made sure i was on the right account twice. When I try to add my printer, it says "This printer is already registered to an account." So I can't even add it to troubleshoot it on Android. Absolutely insane.

I used to like this app. It made printing the line work I designed for my art super easy. Resizing was no but deal, because the app used to give me the dimensions as I resized, which was especially helpful when I had to split the print across multiple pages. Not anymore! You're shooting in the dark and praying the size will line up when you print, leading to a bunch of wasted prints. But it's no shock since your CEO wants to make printing a subscription service. Planning to switch to Epson now.

App is non-functional. I took the time to set up every shortcut through the app which makes things way more complicated than they need to be, and still nothing works. The app is incredibly inconvenient and a total waste of time with the exception of cancelling your membership to hp+ (which I recommend). Don't waste your time. Buy Epson or Canon or some other printer that keeps things simple and efficient.

Used to be great, but now it won't work. I loved being able to print from my phone and used this feature way more than my laptop. Now I can not get it to find my printer, or it says the printer is offline when it's not and if it does it print, it only prints a quarter of the page and that is all. I hope this can be fixed, like maybe an update screwed it up. It worked perfectly for years before recently.

My printer used to work with this app but has recently been intermittently becoming "unavailable" in the app despite the printer indicating it is connected to my network. The app is totally useless for troubleshooting. It says my printer is "older" and can't show status information. It is only two years old! I will be avoiding HP in the future.

This app is horrendous. It never works correctly. First, it was a connection to wifi problem. Get that figured out now it won't print a photo without a border even though I choose borderless prints. I can't print a document from my phone because it tells me I have 5x7 photo paper in the main tray. My time is too precious to mess with this printer anymore, and I will be buying a different brand printer and ditching the HP for good.

The app is great when it works. I have uploaded and scanned many things this week using the printer scan option. It worked fine. Today, I go to scan another document, and it says "feature unavailable." I also have to unplug/power off the printer to even print things at times. It would be nice to have some consistency.

HP is out for me. Currently trying their monthly print subscription but the app itself is of low quility. When tapping on settings it opens up your web browsing app which alerts you that this app is not safe. While i understand why it is done this way it be best if everything was integrated in the app itself instead of prompting other apps to work with HP smart. Settings are scattered all over the app such as print quility which can be accessed when a file has been selected and ready to print.

Once I purchased the cord and set up the printer, the app and printer worked well. It's only been a month. it was a pain in the butt to set up the printer. You have to use an ethernet cord "internet connection" first on a computer or laptop, then add the printer on the app for wireless printing. I had to purchase the cord separately because it didn't come with the printer . Wireless printing only works from my phone, not my laptop. I will update in a few months or so. :)

This would be a really good app. You to have an account because they want you to use instant ink. So there's HP site and an HPsmart site as cloud service. So much to do just to print. Apps is full of clutter and stuff that I don't need on a regular basis for my tablet or phone. It's definitely not simple while it rocks between landscape and portrait mode. Also, there no way to remove my old printer which is already recycled. My new printer is now secondary.

The "Printer Scan" doesn't work at all. I can print from my device, but can't scan anything. I restarted the printer and still the issue persist. Error is " there is no connection to the printer" but how come I can print from my device??? Please fix this! UPDATE: Until now HP hasn't fix this "Printer Scan" on mobile, I was able to use this feature before with my old 2622, but not now with 2755e printer. Fix your junk App now! I'm ready to switch to Epson! Your App is a total trash!

The app is great BUT I will not be using HP again! I used to love my HP Deskjet 2755e. And then I decided to do the ink subscription and now my prints are glitchy, looks like they are printed in 3D every time. No matter how many times I align it. Even after I cancelled the subscription and used the regular cartridges like it says to do, it won't print at all so I have to have the ink subscription to even get poor print quality. I will not be using HP again!

Recently got a new printer and a new computer. Was really hoping this app would actually work. It worked once, now it says 'this printer isn't available right now'. Which is what it did with the old printer! Very very frustrating!! Won't even work when I downloaded doc as a pdf. Why can't somebody fix this app! Apparently, no one reads these reviews!

This app is great whenever it doesn't glitch. Always prompts you to log in and doesn't always sync up right with the printer. Can't even scan from my printer anymore because the "feature is unavailable" even though I tried everything to fix it . I usually don't leave bad reviews but this app deserves it.

Not good. Incomplete instructions. Not easy to print/scan. App logs off account. Only prints some PDFs & photos; other file types & MS Office docs 'grayed out'. No dedicated highly functional 'print/scan/fax' software. Interface cluttered w/ ads & promotions. No Ethernet port. Unsecure connection. Setup requires credit card; should not be needed until free ink trial is over. Changes phone settings; reset them & app changes them back. HP raised instant ink prices after signing up. Never HP again.

Absolute garbage. Paying per month would make sense if the quality of the product wasn't the absolute worst it could possibly be. Prints a setup page and then when printing what you orginally wanted it will say low ink and not do anything. Then it will say to align the paper but give no info if anything is actually happening. Thought it would finally print what i wanted after but it was just a setup page. Won't allow correct scaling either, I need a certain size line printed and can't get it.

Terrible experience. Not at all Intuitive. I tried to get help from HP and can't even get past the robo menu. I'm really wishing that I had bought a cheap printer from somebody else because this one is not serving me well at all. And I have been able to print absolutely nothing from my phone so I guess I will go look for an app that works and uninstall this one. I cannot at all recommend HP. Tech support is non existent after money is spent.

This is a FANTASTIC APP. So far, it's working like a charm!! It's smooth-running, has a gazillion features & options, including print from anywhere. You will need to dwnload the HP Print Svc Plugin 4 thus to work (very small). Am running this from HP 8015e OfficeJet (excellent, compact) printer on a Galaxy S9+. You don't have to buy a fancy printer bc this app extends features. There are some ins/outs & it takes time to learn it, but once u get the hang of it you'll wonder how u ever lived w/out

This service rarely works properly, and even when it does it's fairly barebones and useless. I can't even scale things as needed, can't change orientation, it just prints in the default regardlesss, no customization, and being forced into an app and subscription service just to be able to use a subpar printer is obviously not ideal.

One day after monthly payments for about 2 years, a defective cartridge was identified. Service disabled color ability until the replacement cartridge could be installed. The cartridge never arrived. I repeatedly reported the lack of cartridge and full printer function. I continued paying and restricted to B&W. It was a great and crippling inconvenience. Over one year of begging for proper support absolutely nothing. So done with HP. The printers are awesome. The printing is good.

Horrendous! Can't scan anymore hp 8625 Update 10/2023. Absolutely useless app, printing couldn't be more difficult from a phone. Use to work without even thinking. But their updates just create an incredibly frustrating experience. This is why we have eliminated all HP devices from our lives and am shopping for a new printer. I can't scan, can't print, so why have a printer and scanner. Instead of modifying the app to get more data from the user why not just make it easy to use. Run away!!!

This was perfect over a year ago. Print anywhere?The last printer I had allowed me to go to the app and print anywhere. This one makes me send an email to the printer. When i print multiple documents or photos, it only prints the first document after I change the layout to "fit page " instead of "fill" fill cuts off your documents. I used to be able to access all of my albums from the app now only a few the app selects. What's going on please update the app and add these features back.!! 🙏

Terrible update!!! Use to be able to make lots of adjustments, and see how the size would look on the paper size. Also when selecting a photo, we are limited on which photos from our gallery, we can use. I'm looking for a new photo printer and have been HP loyal for many years. This update will have me looking at other brands. Very disappointed.

Unstable connection and setup of printers that reliable connect to Windows PC. I've setup multiple printers on this app that took several identical attempts to get connected to app until successful. Then a day or two later, the app loses connection, while my PCs work with the printer fine. IP addresses are reserved in my router, so they don't change. The app no longer lets me enter the IP address. This app has led me to never purchase an HP printer again.

As usually happens with HP updates, the app for this printer has been rendered largely useless. If I can get it to recognize a previously connected printer (a 50/50 proposal at best), the odds of it doing something as simple as scanning an image drop precipitously. I primarily use my mobile device for everything, but for this basic task had to bust out the laptop, which has its own quirks in connecting because it, too, is an HP pos.

I attempted to scan after successfully doing it once but I am now met with"feature unavailable". I've gone through all troubleshooting, such as uninstall/install, unplug, sign out, etc and there are still no changes. It's disappointing that this is not being fixed as I see this has been a trend for the last two years as evident by other reviews. I have other issues with this app but this is the most annoying.

Size adjustment was removed. I use to be able to see how big or small a image would be before printing. Now I have to waste paper in hopes I'm adjusting it correctly...very disappointing. Update: I also can't access all my photo albums. I really don't want to scroll back years worth of pictures to print ONE that is needed. This update absolutely SUCKS.

I've used this app for over 2 years, it has countless bugs, the app always seems to not find my printer, even though I've connected it. I go to scan a document today and the app is stuck on a loading screen, it won't even load. After clearing cache then reinstalling the app on my phone, it still won't load! How can we use the freaking printer if the app doesn't work?!!

I ha e had a hard time getting it to stay connected to print, now that my "free trial" on insta ink has ran out my printer won't print at all. I can't reinstall it, I can't connect to the network, I can't do anything! It's very frustrating and all the virtual assistant said is turn it off and back on. Well iv been doing that for a week and still getting nowhere!

The instructions on how to reset the WiFi are incredibly unclear. There's no text to clarify, it's just an image showing an arrow towards several buttons. What am I supposed to do? Tap each button in succession? If so, what order? Do I press and hold them in a certain order, press and hold all of them? If I have to press and hold, for how long? What indicator of 'success' am I looking for? Very very poor experience. If I ever buy another printer, it won't be hp if this is the set up process

Update completely ruined the app. "Minor enhancements", try major disappointment. Took away certain photo editing, like being able to manually adjust the size of the photo or document, made it more steps to select the photo or document and I can no longer print directly from my phone albums like I could before (this issue was resolved by uninstalling hp smart after I got tired of the bs).

Hp smart app. Which one? And why have a display when you can multiple the steps to troubleshoot a printer. That is of course if the vast number of hp smart app is itself is not experiencing anything but perfection. Along with the app, your device must function perfectly, and wii fii perfectly all together. Only then you may attempt to fix or adjust hp printer. It's retarded to trouble shoot. To put it nicely.

1 star is being generous! Since the update, when I print an email my left margin is affected. The print is large, everything is shifted to the left & every first letter on the left side is cut off. I called HP and they attempted to troubleshoot but were of no help. Said that it was my phone carrier or an email app issue. Really?? When I print the same email from my laptop it works fine but who has time to print from a laptop when the mobile app is supposed to be efficient?

Every single document I print says the printer is blocked when it is not. It will not let me "cancel" The print job. Turning off and restarting my printer does not help, neither does restarting my phone. Fortunately I can still print, I just keep getting more and more notices on my phone that my printer is blocked. Very frustrating!

Why is an app required at all when you already have my money for buying the printer/scanner?? The app sucks. I just want to print/scan directly without the app. I had the printer printing and when I wanted to scan it required the app. Then it says it cannot find my printer. It's not listed. THIS IS A BRAND NEW HP 2700E PRINTER!! I don't receive any 2-way verifications so I cannot complete the setup, printer shows it's connected to WIFI, the app says I'm not. Can't scan after 2 hours!!!

It is so buggy as to be almost unusable with an extremely unintuitive layout. It's missing basic features like a print queue and everything you click on tries to sell you instant ink. It's a terrible app they force you to use to harvest your data and give you nothing in return. Save yourself the hassle and buy a different brand printer.

This app is useless and meaningless. If you want to make it simpler to connect to the device, Bluetooth should have been the option you should have gone with. A printer with a scanner that doesn't scan because you need to meet a bunch of requirements is beyond useless to me or anyone I know. I'll be be searching for a better printer and discarding your unreliable printer.

Takes too long to connect to the printer; frequently signs me out and it's a hassle to sign in (takes me through 2-3 websites outside of the app). Won't let me connect directly to the printer unless the printer is connected to the internet. Frequently crashes and has to be reinstalled. Will occasionally uninstall itself without warning and after being used to print or scan a few pages/docs and before I'm done using it.

I've had HP printers for a very long time I've finally thrown them out. After installing high-capacity ink cartridges and have them only lasts possibly four months and the cartridge is still full and the printer will not recognize the cartridge. What a waste of money. I am through with HP products. Along with the app not connecting when I try to remotely print something from my phone. Up until recently HP is the only printer I have ever owned in the last 20 years.

Won't let me scan unless I use a 3rd party app now. I called into instant ink and that was their solution. Mobile faxing only last so many months and can't even subscribe to more of it. Have to make a whole new account. I constantly on computer have spooler problems. When I don't pay my instant ink I not only have a shut down of ink usages, but the whole damned printer. I have to trick it into working. On top of that, the instant ink price hike. Don't get hp anything.

I am having a difficult time getting it to work through the tiles. I can select print photo and it acts like it's going to print but nothing pops up. I can print only by selecting the picture within my gallery and then select print. I will change my review once I am able to utilize the app the way it's intended!

Horrible and incorrect instructions. First time setup was fine, but after router died and I needed a new one :[ Instead of the app telling me what to do it told me to print a test page by holding the i button. That page told me to get wifi instructions I needed to do something else that didn't work. I wasted way too much time finally I downloaded the manual. The correct instructions were not a paragraph. Your departments need to communicate with each other. No way I'd recommend this to others.

It's asking me to install the app. I already have the app, I can never seem to print when I want a print. There's always a song in the dance and a problem, it's always can't find the printer when I'm actually staring right after d*** thing, it's not recognizing my printer. I was so aggravated before I just grew the old print throughout which nothing was wrong with it and bought a new one. And I still have problem. I don't get this it doesn't work all the time help

Pain in #*%#. Nothing works right. What should be a simple scan and/or print taking a few moments turns into long drawn out efforts, from HP's "Smart" system not recognizing the printer is on and connected, to paper not feeding and mis-feeding (which counts as a copy each time that happens) to scanning and saving to only the ether fairies know where.

Great app! My only complaint would be dealing with the instant ink cartridges. if your printer goes for a certain amount of time without being connected to the internet and you have instant ink cartridges installed, it will shut the instant ink cartridges down and you will not be able to print with them until you link back up your printer for the internet. That's a bunch of nonsense.

easy to use. FYI, if you move and your network changes. Delete the ap and reinstall the ap on all devices. if your printer doesn't have a touch screen, press and hold the WFi button and the red X or cancel button at the same time to put the printer in discovery mode. The help option isn't very helpful when the network changes.

What a terrible app! Have downloaded and installed it twice. When I open it my screen starts flickering and the app dances around like it's having a seizure. HP has really dropped the ball with their printer software. Even on my PC, their printer apps never work except when they're trying to get me to buy ink. Makes me miss my old black and white Samsung printer.

This app used to work great. Now it can't find my printer, even though it shows that it's subscribed and connected. It is beyond frustrating! If course the option to sign up for the ink service works great. Please get this fixed or I will be canceling my ink subscription. No point having it if the app can't find my printer.

The app literally doesn't do anything. It's only purpose is to try to force you into an ink membership. You can't print from it - it just starts printing a blank page and keeps reprinting the same page with nothing until you cancel the job. Go to print from windows - doc prints just fine. I really dont understand why a printing company would pay someone tens of thousands of dollars to develop an app that you can't print from. Mind-boggling Look at the reviews people. EVERY REVIEW is one star.

Extremely horrible! Instant ink and HP is the worst set up I've ever had! I can never print anything when I want to, or especially when I need to! I have a printer, I have ink, I have paper. All bought and paid for! I wish I had never got signed on with instant ink! It's the biggest business mistake I've ever made! I will never recommend your services! They're controlling and difficult to use. There's always some type of connection issue or billing issue. And I can't get rid of it!

I agree idk if it's the app or just go products at this point. I'm disappointed this printer has so much confusion on just to set up and print. Offers instantink services that are just as confusing. Whole thing is a huge waste of damn time I think. I've yet to discover how to just print something without getting lost in the process and it being a whole re set up every timw id like to print something.idk it may just be me i feel dumb 😐

I'm giving you three stars because I am able to do most things but I found out a way around this because I couldn't print with this app on some of my devices. It is difficult to the to the Wi-Fi so I've been leaving my printer on so that I won't have the headache of trying to reconnect to the wi-fi. Developers need to go back and check some of the processes that most of us like to do. My only frustration was loading the paper.

This app is not working properly anymore. It used to allow me to print from my phone and worked really well, I do not have a computer to print from and now it will not print. I've tried uninstalling, signing out and back in, all the things I can, still to no avail. The app closes itself and says there is a bug that the developer needs to fix. Please fix, I need to print for school! Thank you!

Doesn't work with my printer. It used to and my printer is still listed in the compatible devices. It will connect through the Windows app, just not the Android one. Though given how many hurdles I had to go through on Windows and the fact it won't even work on Android (plus they added that it requires Bluetooth to connect to Wi-Fi) makes me really suspicious. I shouldn't have to buy a new printer when my older one works just fine. The app makes it cumbersome,if not impossible, to use my printer

This app sucks. I'm trying to change the network settings for my printer, via the app, so that it can connect to the new router. HP has made it unnecessarily difficult to do what should've been a simple task. I feel like all I'm getting is the runaround. Even the "printer setup" link won't work for me. They sure make it REAL easy to join their ink subscription, though. Funny how getting your money is all laid out in a simplistic manner. This app is not intuitive and certainly isn't "smart."

Sporadic functionality. Never know if it will work. I have excellent wifi in my house yet the printer often won't connect for no apparent reason. The scan function does not work. Message states, my printer doesn't support HP Smart or vice versa, and my all-in-one unit is only a year old. HP printers and functionality used to be easy and reliable. Now, they're almost useless and waste an enormous amount of time without completing tasks.

Prepare yourself to be frustrated. If you've purchased an hp printer and are setting it up, put it back in the box and get your money back. These printers have to be reset, and the app has to be uninstalled then reinstalled anytime you want to print. The only people giving this thing 5 star reviews were paid to do so or are bots. Despite your printer being on network and your phone being on network, your printer will be offline, there's no way to fix that with removing it all and starting over.

So in September 2023 HP. updated the app and changed its layout in HP smart and HP print apps. The login for HP lost ALL printer info and troubleshooting says " factory reset printer and reset it up"! You know how much of a pita that is to do and reset each device up? 2 cellphone, PC, 2 tablets, wifi syncing, wasting half the ink in printer to do all the testing. Horrible update. don't do it.

The app has turned my perfectly functional printer into an expensive brick! It worked fine all year, until it decided to remove itself from my network and now it refuses to reconnect. I tried everything. Then I learned it's part of the company's planned obsolescence. After one year, these printers are designed to break to force you to buy a new one.

Worst expérience. This app makes me really want to invest in another printer and incurr the additional cost. Good printer, very very bad app. The scanning does not work, I can never print a whole document at one shot, it always stops in the middle of the printing, and several times. Hence, if I want to print one document, I have to sit next to the printer and print it at several interval.

It appears after each update the app gets worse 😕 I had selected 4 pages out of an 8-page document but the app kept crushing and the printer would only print 1.5 pages at best, or just half a page. Wasted paper and pages from my allowance..! In the end had to print one page at a time. What is going on? Direct WiFi printer has disappeared from the list altogether, but in the printer settings it is shown as on. After this printer has given up the ghost I will never buy another HP printer!..

I can't adjust pictures before I print them anymore !!!!!!! For years I've been able to resize pictures. Now that option has disappeared from my app. It wants to just print the picture to fill/fit the entire sheet of paper. Sometimes I don't need a huge picture. Sometimes I want to print smaller things that don't take up the entire sheet of paper and use up all that ink. Why would you remove such a basic feature?

Very annoyed. After painstakingly scanning 100+ documents with the camera scanner for 3 hours the app isn't allowing me to save it saying "the final pdf cannot be created because some items are..." (toast truncated). If the app isn't tested to work on so many documents you should have put a hard limit. Now I'll have to do that work all over again. After being a user of the app for so many years I think it's time to move on.

HP's printers work well, but this app is garbage. I have to sign in through the website every time I use it, and it usually doesn't recognize my printer on the first or second try. Just a bad experience compared to other network devices. UPDATE - if you cancel your instant ink subscription, the cartridges currently in your printer stop working. Something to think about before signing up (I wish I never had).

Experience can be temperamental when things stop working for no apparent reason. Not sure whether this is always the app or the software/firmware on the printer, issues with HP Cloud or a combination of all 3. For example, yesterday, the app lost the ability to show ink levels on the printer. However, accessing this information via a web browser showed it within seconds. Sometimes my printer fails to wake up and I need to physically unplug it to reboot it.

Absolutely awful and unusable app. Extremely slow, sometimes buttons just don't work, sometimes it says the printer is low on paper while in reality it's not, sometimes it just doesn't see the printer, right now I can't print the document because after sending it to print it just crashes, the desktop app for windows is even worse, this entire experience makes me want to learn to code and figure out how to make an app for this and connect it to my printer.

Thoroughly disappointed. I now use the phone app more than the desktop app and it is completely inadequate for something as basic as printing. Where to begin? No 2-sided print option, no way to set default print settings (e.g. draft quality, b&W, etc), only allows to print pdf docs (no way to print word, slides, etc). This is not even addressing the challenge to connect to the device: I've seen fridges with better connectivity. HP, you need to do better.

I bought the deskjet 2710e because my daughter has one and it is a fab printer. I set mine up and I've had nothing but trouble with it. It continously disconnects from my phone. I've had to uninstall and reinstall the app to set the printer up again and again. When I have yet again got it printing, I changed the black ink as I was printing out some documents and it ran out, it then decided to stop printing. I can scan and print but seriously, I could throw it in the bin, it is that frustrating.

Absolutely terrible. All it has to do is to print files. Not sure if the printer or the app is trash but it just doesnt want to print. After choosing what i want to print via in-app menu either the final print button sends me back to choose a file again or crashes the whole app if it feels like it. Sometimes it takes so long for the printer to decide to print that i forget i needed a print. And 25% of the ink is shown as depleted via the app after around 20 prints (its ink costs around 50eur).

Trash, absolutely a waste of time. I tried scanning about 50 pages, but exporting it to pdf absolutely worthless, illegible gibberish. There is some hard limit to the scanner functionality that you come to know after painstakingly try scan documents and pull your hair out after a few hours of hardwork all go down the drain. Why not advertise this app as only capable of taking one or two pages scans - oh wait nobody would buy their stuff. Don't waste your time. A generic reply to be expected down

Don't buy a wireless HP Printer!!!! I just spent 6h trying to print one thing and it won't print it. I reset everything made a account did everything I was told and it still doesn't work. What's the point of a printer that can't print!!! This app also sucks it constantly can't find my printer like it's the only job it has. Thank God I keeps the receipt so I can return this and get my money back useless. Just put back the cable what was so bad about it you just put it into your computer.

Worked perfectly well until update before last. Since then the HP Smart print plugin crashes my printer with a blue screen: disable the HP Smart plugin on phone, restart printer, use a different print sevice plugin and all works again. Latest update does not seem to have been tested properly before release. Spent a lot of time figuring this out. The error is clearly linked to HP Smart print plugin. Disappointing.

Needs restarting, rebooting of devices and printers pretty much for every use. Wish I'd been able to test before purchasing HP printer. I'm quicker transferring to a physically connected device. Not what I invested in. Such are tech companies.. Has absolutely no troubleshooting functionality, if the printer or software doesn't behave as expected the only option is to throw it out and buy new, or continuously and fruitlessly restart the advised sequence.

Update! Now can only print 5 pages max and does not access all my albums and have to print from source itself, wee trip to find a better printer today. This was a really good set up, done everything i needed, why has the resize option been taken from this app, its really hard to navigate before print and definitely not happy i can't make prints to sizes required, definitely need to rethink my next printer as this is now useless for me.

Terrible app the printer isn't much better. It only connects once out of every six or seven tries. Now even worse, the only way I can print from the phone is to log onto the app and hope. Now every time I open the app on the mobile it asks me to login to my hp account, WHY? Nothing will print direct from word, email etc. Given up and bought an Epson ET2850, full set of ink cheaper and I only need to add the colour that's run out not everything.

Keeps saying printer is blocked from printing, especially when performing 2 sided printing. Warnings won't erase. Extremely limited by what settings I can send to printer as well as scanning, etc. Cannot setup for auto 2 sided printing from mobile phone, ludicrous as well as ridiculous.

Selecting pages to print is not working as supposed, especially when selecting straight from the Printables section. Downloading the files and manually choosing to print them through a pdf reader sometimes does the trick, but it is not straightforward and slow. Sending print jobs to tge printer is slow. Please fix this, thank you.

Awful app awful service to be paying for. Virtual assistant doesn't do anything just wait to connect. Printer refuses to work. Can't copy anything because it's saying ink needs replacing and it's telling me the ink inside isn't hp when in fact it is as it was sent by hp through the app. Update payment method and my account is on hold till they take a payment so can't use printer

BIG HIGHLIGHTS: 1)MALAYSIA CODE FOR LOGIN CELLPHONE IS NOT AVAILABLE. 2)Already sign in and ready to print,but when comes into PREVIEW it is just stuck over there and keep loading.....very wasted! 3)Me as one of a HP USERS was trying so hard to follow the intructions,to setup everything and end up nothing. 4)I thought this app is function like this simple step - just on the printer,connect wifi or bluetooth using an ADROID phone,ans connect with printer and then ready to print out that's all.

It doesn't work. The whole computer setup process is highly complicated, and that's coming from a young and technologically literate man. Why is it so hard to connect the printer with Bluetooth, WiFi and bing, bang, boom, you can wirlessly print. But no, you can't. Stone age technology right here...

THE WORST experience I've had with printers. Take me back to the days of plugging my printer to a laptop and pressing print. I can't simply press print on any of my files. Had find a work around. Now I have to "send file" through HP smart, only for it to take 1-2 minutes thinking about what it's printing before finally printing. I also can't print multiple copies at a time. I can only print 5 copies max before the printer can't comprehend anymore and just stop working. Subscription for this?!!!

Ridiculously complex to set up and install. HP printer Office Pro 7740 and PH Envoy laptop. Installed Windows 11 and the printer did not work correctly. Could not differentiate printer tray1 and tray 2. Would not print A3. Had to swop trays to make it work. All the colours jumbled up and printing Black browns and greys. Had to waste 2 hours trying to reinstall everything and get it to work. Windows trying to take over at every move. Hopeless. Will have to upgrade printer and laptop now.

18/11/23 For some reason in the last few weeks this app has stopped recognising my printer. I can no longer scan despite resetting the printer and reinstalling the app and the printer goes offline all of the time. I got two of the printers because I was happy and they worked perfectly. Now I have to buy new ones because they both have the same issue. I will no longer be recommending HP printers to anyone I know. 28/1/24 Above problem seemed to resolve itself the other day. Now it's back

The app is NOT friendly at all. A lot of problems. Cant log-in into the app. Entering to endless loop (some problem of cookies?). And the bigger problem is that without this app it's impossible to set-up my printer. Terrible! I just want to print documents from my phone, not open accounts and not trying 30 times log-in ! Phone: Xiaomi POCO x3 pro, android 12, chrome browser the last version.

The super great app and very useful app. It helps to take printout directly from mobile without hassle of transferring file to pc which leaved extra copy of file to pc, usb etc. Secondly it gives enough option of printing, the one i like the most is print on both sides. Greatttt. Highly recommend to all.

The phone app barely finds the printer. I wanted to have a quick easy to access printer in my house, but I didn't get that. I have to spend at least an hour sittinf next to the printer with my phone,laptop and tablet trying to connect to the printer. Very disappointed

The scan option never works with hp smart app..always says scan unsuccessful. I have restarted and reset the printer multiple times but no impact. With HP capture app the scan option was working perfectly. With HP smart app I can print but not scan. Regret the purchase of HP printer. I have M126 nw laser jet pro printer with me.

It's not "Smart" at all! I just purchased an HP printer and I'm wasting all of my ink on Testing papers and not any print jobs! I can print on any nearby printer, but not on mine!! HORRIBLE!!! Over 30 hours...and NOT WORKING!! *LATEST UPDATE!: Over 8 more hours trying to print today and IT'S NOT WORKING!!! Worst, EVER.

Horrible, Terrible down right Useless, don't waste your money or time on these products. I have a HP Chromebook & a HP printer that are both updated & connected to the same network but doesn't recoginize or connect to each other. The HP smart app is HP Stupid. It wont find my printer at all. Straight trash

This app is now worthless. I downloaded HP Smart on my Google Pixel 6 and it says my HP printer is not available even though it is connected to to my network. When I try it says no printers found despite the fact that I have two wifi printers that are and have been hooked up and are on line.
it's alright but the app doesn't allow people to adjust the size of their picture on it's own anymore. It also says that 'cannot connect to printer' when everything has already been done.

Garbage, just like the printers it's for. Says printer is disconnected even though I printed from my computer 30 seconds before. Every year I spend 2 hours on the phone with tech support to hard reset the printer and make it work again.
